headline: XPeng: Positive Outlook Backed By Robust Deliveries Growth
summary: XPeng's Q3 2024 results showed a 16.3% increase in vehicle deliveries and positive gross and vehicle margins. Read why I maintain a Buy rating on XPEV stock.

headline: XPENG Reports Strong Vehicle Delivery Growth in Q4 2024
summary: XPeng, Inc. ADR ( (XPEV) ) has issued an update. XPENG Inc. reported a significant increase in vehicle deliveries for December and the fourth quarter of 2024, reaching 36,695 units in December, marking an 82% year-over-year increase. The company delivered 91,507 units in Q4, a 52% increase year-over-year, and 190,068 units for the entire year, up 34% from the previous year. headline: Tesla: Major Q4 Delivery Disappointment
summary: Tesla's Q4 delivery miss and potential threats from Trump's EV policy could impact TSLA's premium valuation in 2025. See why I'm going to keep my sell rating.
